io.spine.server.transport

Interface MessageChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Publisher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChannel, InMemoryPublisher, Subscriber

    public interface MessageChannel
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A channel dedicated to exchanging the messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      static io.spine.server.transport.ChannelId channelIdFor(io.spine.type.TypeUrl messageType)
      Converts the given message type into a ChannelId.
      io.spine.server.transport.ChannelId id()
      Obtains the channel identifier.
      boolean isStale()
      Allows to understand whether this channel is stale and can be closed.
      default io.spine.type.TypeUrl targetType()
      Obtains the type of the messages transferred through this channel.

    • Method Detail

      • id

        io.spine.server.transport.ChannelId id()
        Obtains the channel identifier.

      • isStale

        boolean isStale()
        Allows to understand whether this channel is stale and can be closed.
        Returns:
        true if the channel is stale, false otherwise

        Converts the given message type into a ChannelId.

        messageType - the type of messages transmitted through the channel
        Returns:
        channel ID
